channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Demand for Tesla nosedives in EV-friendly Europe amid jeers over Elon Musk’s endorsement of the far right
item.description: Popularity has plummeted in markets like Germany, a country still haunted by its fascist past, where Tesla's share of EV sales plummeted to just 3.7% ...

item.title: Trump elevates birthright citizenship fight with appeal of judge's block
item.description: The Justice Department filed an appeal Thursday night challenging a judge's blockade on President Trump's birthright-citizenship executive order.

item.title: Philippine lawmakers plan to approve bill to ban ore exports
item.description: The Philippines hopes to emulate Indonesia, where a similar ban on metal ore exports boosted investment in smelting and refineries.

item.title: Hordes of rats are infesting cities and the $27 billion a year problem is only getting worse
item.description: The rodents' numbers are rising because of conditions that humans have created.

item.title: What’s the Winning Ingredient in M&A? The Answer Lies in Due Diligence
item.description: The days of due diligence as a box-checking exercise are over.

item.title: Did Real Assets Provide an Inflation Hedge When Investors Needed it Most?
item.description: Real assets' first test in modern times started in 2021. Did they perform as hoped?

item.title: Book Review: The Making of Modern Corporate Finance
item.description: Donald Chew delivers a love letter to unfettered capitalism and the financial system that oils the gears of commerce.

item.title: Here’s How Trump’s Department Of Transportation Can Make It Easier For Americans To Start Families
item.description: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy signed a memo reorienting all federal transportation funding toward supporting marriage and families.

item.title: US seizes second plane owned by Venezuelan government in Dominican Republic, citing evasion of sanctions

item.description: Skill and alpha are scarce and difficult to obtain in the hedge fund market.

item.title: New Zealand hints at letting more foreign investors buy homes
